name: Jam Jar Adventure
description:
Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD to move

Z or Space to Jump

X or J to Shoot

Play as a jar of jam as you go on an adventure to stop the mayhem that the Jello monster has created! Shoot you way through the obstacles in your journey!

Credits:

Art by marlink15 and PraetoPotato

Programmed by Haocean and PraetoPotato

Music by Praeto Potato

Sound Effects from Freesound.org
